ygData.subject: Soloing at 21
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, Well after playing some other chars for awhile I decided to give my wizard another shot.  I went to the karanas.  Instead of enstill I had root
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all,

Well after playing some other chars for awhile I decided to give my wizard another shot. I went to the karanas. Instead of enstill I had root memed. I didn't have Force Shock memed either. To my suprise the root rooted griffawns and griffines great. They resisted my enstill all the time when I tried to solo out in the karanas last time. Then to kill it I just used any spell other then Force Shock. I soloed fine. A druid friend of mine and I then got together and killed reds very easily. Great exp for 2 people. Well it seem to be that the lower level spells work better. Perhpas enstill will work well when I am 30ish.

Venlaan
21st DE Wizard
